title: Bug 117981: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description: Description: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the item.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus shifts to the library file node.
EB: The expected behavior is that when selecting an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item should be highlighted or marked as selected without the focus shifting to the library file node.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Select the label item in the library outline view for the first time.
